shared.model.map

Class Hex

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.map.Hex

  • public class Hex
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Hex tile on the map.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private HexType hexType 
      private HexLocation location 
      private int numberTile
      The number assigned to this tile.
      private ResourceType resourceType 
      private boolean robber
      This is stored as true if the robber is on this hex.

        private ResourceType resourceType

      • numberTile

        private int numberTile
        The number assigned to this tile. Range of number is [2-12], representative of the possible rolls of 2 dices

      • robber

        private boolean robber
        This is stored as true if the robber is on this hex.

    • Method Detail

      • canPlaceSettlement

        public void canPlaceSettlement(PlayerInfo player,
                               VertexLocation location)
                        throws PlacementException
        Method that indicates whether a player has the ability to place a settlement in a certain location on the map
        Parameters:
        player - -- this will be the player placing the settlement
        location - -- this will be the location of the settlement; must ensure that this space on the map is empty
        Throws:
        PlacementException - -- exception thrown if either of the two above statements cannot be true

      • canPlaceCity

        public void canPlaceCity(PlayerInfo player,
                         VertexLocation location)
                  throws PlacementException
        Method that indicates whether a player has the ability to place a city in a certain location on the map
        Parameters:
        player - -- this will be the player placing the city
        location - -- this will be the location of the city; must ensure that this space already has a settlement located their owned by this player
        Throws:
        PlacementException - -- exception thrown if either of the two above statements cannot be true

      • canPlaceRoad

        public void canPlaceRoad(PlayerInfo player,
                         EdgeLocation location)
                  throws PlacementException
        Method that indicates whether a player has the ability to place a city on a certain edge on the map
        Parameters:
        player - -- this will be the player placing the road
        location - -- this will be the edge location where the road will be placed; must ensure this space is empty on the map
        Throws:
        PlacementException - -- exception thrown if either of the two above statements cannot be true

      • setHasRobber

        public void setHasRobber(boolean newHasRobber)

        public boolean hasRobber()
